Articles.Content:
Is it possible and if so, how do you do it?

Edited September 2, 2014 by NERVAfan
change to answered

Is it possible and if so, how do you do it?

Not currently possible, but it will be when .25 is released.

For now, EVA.

Ah, OK, thanks... I couldn't find a way but the description of the Clamp-o-tron Jr. says that you cant' transfer crew because it's too small... which implies that the larger ones can...

but if it's just not implemented yet, that makes sense.
It can be modded for, I'm sure ... I don't know if any given mod takes the part descriptions into account, though.
Use ship manifesto mod, and if you want some realistic setup, with connected living space mod.

Ah, OK, thanks... I couldn't find a way but the description of the Clamp-o-tron Jr. says that you cant' transfer crew because it's too small... which implies that the larger ones can...

but if it's just not implemented yet, that makes sense.

So true. I only started a couple weeks ago, and I had the same problem. I assumed I needed to open the hatch from inside the cockpit.
